description:
The defender of justice, Bunji Man! He patrols the town looking for people in trouble, with Fumi and the others in tow. Upon doing so, he encounters a young boy trying to find a winning ice cream stick at a convenience store; Upon returning home from school, Bunji casually announces that he had an accident (#2) at school. Mom is startled and tells him that he must bear it and continue to focus, when that happens; That night, Mom, Mrs. Morita, and Mrs. Nagasaki gather at the school. They attempt to look for their children`s forgotten items. They brace themselves for the worse as they dig in, but keep finding unexpected things, one after another...; Bunji is invited to dinner at the stately residence of his classmate, Hiku. Bunji frolics around like usual as the butler, Mr. Yagi, grows concerned...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Go Go, Bunji Man / Cleaning Frenzy / Dear son, where are you going... / Bunji`s Assault! Dinner at a Friend`s Place
いけいけブンジマン / 息子よ, どこに... / ガサ入れ / ぶんじの突撃友達んちの晩ご飯
